name: Based Troll
description: One of the most viral memes on Solana is now invading Base. After gaining traction and community hype, we’re bridging chains to revive a legendary meme with fresh energy. Powered by nostalgia, culture, and chaos, this isn’t just another meme token — it’s a movement. With an NFT collection coming soon to add value and identity to every holder, we're building a powerhouse on Base. Join the troll army and be part of something unforgettable.
